```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Lade Beispiel Daten

```{r}
library(magrittr)
fn <- system.file("extdata", "Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse_2010-2014.csv", package = "rOstluft.data", mustWork = TRUE)
data <- rOstluft::read_airmo_csv(fn)
data <- dplyr::filter(data, lubridate::year(starttime) == 2011)
data <- dplyr::arrange(data, starttime)
data
```

Berechne Tagesmittelwerte:
```{r}
rOstluft::resample(data, "d1")
```

Ups RainDur muss summiert werden:
```{r}
data.d1 <- rOstluft::resample(data, "d1", statistic = list(RainDur="sum"))
dplyr::filter(data.d1, parameter == "RainDur")
```
